name: Cat Love Adventure
description:
You are in a situation where your most beloved person or animal is lost or abducted. What are you going to do? Are you willing to deal with the predicaments to bring her back? Or will you become reluctant because of fear? Take courage, and do everything.

The game is inspired by my two cats named Ginger and Patchy. In this game, I want to feature Ginger as the hero who saved his girlfriend against the foes. His girlfriend is also my cat, she is named, Patchy. 

Cat Love Adventure is a fascinating A.I. game on mobile and desktop. Patchy the cat has been abducted and she's in trouble! Please help Ginger to save her girlfriend. Hurry Up! Defeat the enemies at every level and achieve the victory of bringing back your loved one. 

I appreciate you looking into my game. I hope you enjoy the game! 

Comment down below to help you with the problems that you will encounter while playing the game. It really means a lot to the developer if you can provide constructive criticism about the development of the game.

P.S. The game has a plot twist since in real life, Ginger is the cat that is lost. Until then, he never returned.
